apis.short_description: Change the default PXE menu on all configured TFTP servers

domains.full_description: Foreman considers a domain and a DNS zone as the same thing. That is, if you are planning to manage a site where all the machines are or the form hostname.somewhere.com then the domain is somewhere.com. This allows Foreman to associate a puppet variable with a domain/site and automatically append this variable to all external node requests made by machines at that site.

params.description: May be numerical id or domain name

id
params.validator: Must be an identifier, string from 1 to 128 characters containing only alphanumeric characters, space, underscore(_), hypen(-) with no leading or trailing space.

params.description:
The path to the medium, can be a URL or a valid NFS server (exclusive of the architecture).

for example mirror.centos.org/centos/$version/os/$arch where $arch will be substituted for the host's actual OS architecture and $version, $major and $minor will be substituted for the version of the operating system.

Solaris and Debian media may also use $release.
params.name: path

params.description:
The family that the operating system belongs to.

Available families:

  • AIX

  • Archlinux

  • Debian

  • Freebsd

  • Gentoo

  • Junos

  • Redhat

  • Solaris

  • Suse

  • Windows
params.name: os_family

params.description:
The path to the medium, can be a URL or a valid NFS server (exclusive of the architecture).

for example mirror.centos.org/centos/$version/os/$arch where $arch will be substituted for the host's actual OS architecture and $version, $major and $minor will be substituted for the version of the operating system.

Solaris and Debian media may also use $release.
params.name: path
